text: ara tadera madhye kichu loka ache yara tomara katha sone, tarapara tara yakhana tomara kacha theke beriye yaya takhana yadera jnana de'oya hayeche tadera bale, ''se e'imatra ki balale!â€™â€™ Era'i tara yadera hrdayera upare allah mohara mere diyechena, ara tara nijedera kheyalakhusira'i anusarana kare.
